subject: Update README.md to accurately describe SyncTone
body:
Replace outdated "Expo + Supabase + OpenAI Template" documentation
with accurate SyncTone app description including:
- Core messaging features (anonymous identity, chat codes, tone tags)
- Familiar features (reactions, replies, editing, deletion)
- Advanced features (push notifications, in-app notifications, reporting)
- Privacy & security details
- Complete tech stack
- Core concepts (appID, chat_code, tone tags)
- Project structure
- Database schema overview
- Quick start guide
- Development commands
- App flow walkthrough
- Platform support details

README now matches CLAUDE.md documentation and tutorial content.
title: Update README.md to accurately describe SyncTone
